alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Niihau (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 29 at 3:06PM HST until January 30 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU AND MOLOKAI FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI AND FOR EAST FACING SHORES OF KAUAI... .A large northwest (310 degrees) swell will peak overnight and early Monday, then decline late Monday. Wind waves from fresh to strong northeasterly winds will combine with the northwest swell to produce very rough conditions, especially on Kauai and Oahu through early Monday. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST MONDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves of 14 to 18 feet along north facing shores and 8 to 12 feet along west facing shores. * WHERE...Niihau, Kauai Southwest and Kauai North. * WHEN...From noon today to 6 PM HST Monday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
